scripts.dev: npx concurrently "npm run dev -w packages/server" "npm run dev -w packages/web"
scripts.build: npm run build -w packages/shared && npm run build -w packages/server && npm run build -w packages/sdk && npm run build -w packages/cli && npm run build -w packages/web
scripts.test: npm run test -w packages/server && npm run test -w packages/web && npm run test -w packages/cli
scripts.publish:all: npm run build && npm publish -w packages/shared && npm publish -w packages/server && npm publish -w packages/sdk && npm publish -w packages/cli
